mapper.sql: id as id , fee as fee , user_id as userId , agency as agency , from_station as fromStation , to_station as toStation , power_bank as powerBank , fee_type as feeType , order_id as orderId , create_dt as createDt , update_dt as updateDt , create_by as createBy , update_by as updateBy , start_dt as startDt , end_dt as endDt
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_line ( fee, user_id, agency, from_station, to_station, power_bank, fee_type, order_id, create_dt, update_dt, create_by, update_by, start_dt, end_dt ) VALUES ( #{fee}, #{userId}, #{agency}, #{fromStation}, #{toStation}, #{powerBank}, #{feeType}, #{orderId}, #{createDt}, #{updateDt}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{startDt}, #{endDt} )

INSERT INTO order_line ( fee, user_id, agency, from_station, to_station, power_bank, fee_type, order_id, create_dt, update_dt, create_by, update_by, start_dt, end_dt ) VALUES ( #{map.fee}, #{map.userId}, #{map.agency}, #{map.fromStation}, #{map.toStation}, #{map.powerBank}, #{map.feeType}, #{map.orderId}, #{map.createDt}, #{map.updateDt}, #{map.createBy}, #{map.updateBy}, #{map.startDt}, #{map.endDt} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE order_line
fee = #{fee},
user_id = #{userId},
agency = #{agency},
from_station = #{fromStation},
to_station = #{toStation},
power_bank = #{powerBank},
fee_type = #{feeType},
order_id = #{orderId},
create_dt = #{createDt},
update_dt = #{updateDt},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
start_dt = #{startDt},
end_dt = #{endDt},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE order_line
fee = #{map.fee},
user_id = #{map.userId},
agency = #{map.agency},
from_station = #{map.fromStation},
to_station = #{map.toStation},
power_bank = #{map.powerBank},
fee_type = #{map.feeType},
order_id = #{map.orderId},
create_dt = #{map.createDt},
update_dt = #{map.updateDt},
create_by = #{map.createBy},
update_by = #{map.updateBy},
start_dt = #{map.startDt},
end_dt = #{map.endDt},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE order_line
fee = #{update.fee},
user_id = #{update.userId},
agency = #{update.agency},
from_station = #{update.fromStation},
to_station = #{update.toStation},
power_bank = #{update.powerBank},
fee_type = #{update.feeType},
order_id = #{update.orderId},
create_dt = #{update.createDt},
update_dt = #{update.updateDt},
create_by = #{update.createBy},
update_by = #{update.updateBy},
start_dt = #{update.startDt},
end_dt = #{update.endDt},
${nativeSql}
mapper.select:
SELECT
, id
, fee
, user_id
, agency
, from_station
, to_station
, power_bank
, fee_type
, order_id
, create_dt
, update_dt
, create_by
, update_by
, start_dt
, end_dt
FROM order_line
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1
